dcterms:creator: Cassidy Laidlaw
Stuart Russell
Anca Dragan
dcterms:description: The BRIDGE dataset consists of environments designed to evaluate reinforcement learning algorithms, particularly in stochastic settings. It includes sticky-action versions of deterministic MDPs to analyze the effective horizon property.
dcterms:title: BRIDGE Dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: The Penn Action Dataset is a large-scale dataset containing video clips with detailed action annotations, useful for understanding human actions in videos.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang

dcterms:description: The sub-JHMDB dataset is a subset of the JHMDB dataset, focusing on action recognition in videos with annotated actions.
dcterms:title: sub-JHMDB Dataset
